Race.SpecificTitle: Chief of Police -- Town of Cottonport
Council Member -- at Large, Town of Cottonport
Council Member -- District 2, Town of Cottonport
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Avoyelles Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop.#1 -- 10 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Millage)

Summary:  10 year, 10 mills property tax for improving, maintaining, surfacing and/or resurfacing public roads and bridges within the Parish, including incidental drainage and acquiring, maintaining and operating equipment and materials for said purposes, subject to passage of the following Sales Tax proposition.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a ten (10) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $1,035,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of improving, maintaining, surfacing and/or resurfacing public roads and bridges within the Parish, including incidental drainage and acquiring, maintaining and operating equipment and materials for said purposes, provided that the Parish shall not be authorized to levy and collect the Tax unless the following Sales Tax Proposition is also approved by the electorate?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop.#2 -- 1/4% S&U Tax - PJ
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Sales Tax)

Summary:  In the event of the passage of the foregoing Millage Proposition, 10 year, 1/4% sales and use tax for improving, maintaining, surfacing and/or resurfacing public roads and bridges within the Parish, including incidental drainage and acquiring, maintaining and operating equipment and materials for said purposes.
Race.FullText: In the event of the passage of the foregoing Millage Proposition, shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish, all as defined by law (an estimated $900,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, commencing January 1, 2013, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for the purpose of improving, maintaining, surfacing and/or resurfacing public roads and bridges within the Parish, including incidental drainage and acquiring, maintaining and operating equipment and materials for said purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop.#3 -- 3 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 3
(Millage)

Summary: 10 year, 3 mills property tax for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the Parish Courthouse and any improvements thereto and/or expansions thereof.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a three (3) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $310,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the Parish Courthouse and any improvements thereto and/or expansions thereof?
